page.title: 07Fields of Barley and Wheat
page.content: Our square is mainly fields.There is barley,wheat and rape.When we visited our square we saw a {red deer}in a rape field.The majority of trees are deciduous but we also saw a lot of conifers.Most of the deciduous trees are oak and maple.There are two thatched cottages that are over two hundred years old.{Stocking Green { Farm}was built in the 17th Century.All the houses in this area have fairly large gardens.Most gardens have a lot of trees.Nearly every house in this area has at least one dog.All the people we met enjoy living there except for a man who lives on Stocking Green Farm.He doesn't like it in the winter because he is very confined.
